import React from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Budget, Inventory, Reports, Recipes, Orders, Goals, Dashboard } from './pages'; import { Ref, Segment } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import { Sidenav } from './components'; import 'semantic-ui-css/semantic.min.css'; const App = () => { const segmentRef = React.useRef(); return (
) } export default App;
